quest.name: Beyond the Powers of Stone
journal: Hojo is searching for a strapping specimen to help with some heavy lifting.
objectives: Place the piles of stones in the designated areas.

dialogue.name: HOJO
dialogue.text: There's so many frivolous things in this world. We all obsess ourselves with meaningless trinkets and no one stops to consider important things like terraced paddy fields.

dialogue.name: HOJO
dialogue.text: The stones that support each field are in need of constant repair, and yet no one seems to care. It is a tough job for one man alone.

dialogue.name: HOJO
dialogue.text: From the look of you I would say you are capable of lifting a stone or two. Would you mind lending me your strength?

dialogue.name: HOJO
dialogue.text: I will take care of the repair work itself. I simply need you to move several piles of stones to the south closer to the rice paddies.

dialogue.name: HOJO
dialogue.text: Please move those piles of stones to the south closer to the rice paddies.

dialogue.name: HOJO
dialogue.text: Now begins the hard work. One does not simply pile the stones aimlesslyâ”€there is a special technique that must be employed.

dialogue.name: HOJO
dialogue.text: I had been training an apprentice, but they were conscripted by that blasted imperial army. Not a day goes by that I do not long for their return.

dialogue.name: HOJO
dialogue.text: Ah, but there I go sharing my entire life story with a total stranger yet again! Here is your reward.
